name: api_ui_GUIStyle

properties.name: active
properties.description: Rendering settings for when the control is pressed down.

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: Text alignment.

properties.name: border
properties.description: The borders of all background images.

properties.name: clipping
properties.description: What to do when the contents to be rendered is too large to fit within the area given.

properties.name: contentOffset
properties.description: Pixel offset to apply to the content of this GUIstyle.

properties.name: fixedHeight
properties.description: If non-0, any GUI elements rendered with this style will have the height specified here.

properties.name: fixedWidth
properties.description: If non-0, any GUI elements rendered with this style will have the width specified here.

properties.name: focused
properties.description: Rendering settings for when the element has keyboard focus.

properties.name: font
properties.description: The font to use for rendering. If null, the default font for the current GUISkin is used instead.

properties.name: fontSize
properties.description: The font size to use (for dynamic fonts).

properties.name: fontStyle
properties.description: The font style to use (for dynamic fonts).

properties.name: hover
properties.description: Rendering settings for when the mouse is hovering over the control.

properties.name: imagePosition
properties.description: How image and text of the GUIContent is combined.

properties.name: lineHeight
properties.description: The height of one line of text with this style, measured in pixels. (Read Only)

properties.name: margin
properties.description: The margins between elements rendered in this style and any other GUI elements.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of this GUIStyle. Used for getting them based on name.

properties.name: normal
properties.description: Rendering settings for when the component is displayed normally.

properties.name: onActive
properties.description: Rendering settings for when the element is turned on and pressed down.

properties.name: onFocused
properties.description: Rendering settings for when the element has keyboard and is turned on.

properties.name: onHover
properties.description: Rendering settings for when the control is turned on and the mouse is hovering it.
